The researcher is that we do not know the evil I want in the land at the ground of the heaven, or did their Lord want them to guide them, that is, good, as well And the sensitivity is that it is a dangerous matter and the exclusion to surround it with a news and does not hide what is in their saying is the evil I want, etc.As they declared it in goodness, and if the perpetrator of all is God, they are exalted, and they gathered between literature and the good of the belief.
